name: Run n Jump (Darren The Barren)
description:
Run n Jump is a very simple endless platformer, where the main goal is to survive as long as you can, without getting hit by the "Block" (a square object going vertically upwards)

Controls :

A or D to switch direction (the player moves all the time)

Space to jump (There are limited jumps, and you need to collect the squares to refill them) (the jump counter is in the top right corner)
